message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.EnumMap' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.utils.Debugger'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Map' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.utils.Debugger'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.logging.Level' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.utils.Debugger'.
Abbreviation in name 'MOTD' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
